scripts.setup:dev: NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:create && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.destroy:dev: NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:seed:undo:all && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:drop
scripts.reset:dev: npm run destroy:dev && npm run setup:dev
scripts.setup:test: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:create && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate
scripts.destroy:test: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:drop
